blogPost.excerpt: Duet makes it really easy to record and remix music asynchronously with your friends and the world. This is in limited beta, feedback welcome!
blogPost.body: Duet makes it really easy to record and remix music asynchronously with your friends and the world. This is in limited beta, feedback welcome!
blogPost.title: Duet - Record music asynchronously really easily
blogPost.author: Mikey

localize.description: Duet让你真正轻松地与朋友和世界异步录制和混音音乐。这是在有限的测试，欢迎反馈
localize.tagline: 异步录制音乐真的很容易

previous.excerpt: 📈 How do top startups find their early customers? Find out on First 1000. We share a case study every week about how companies like Zapier, Doordash and Tinder got their very first customers.
previous.title: First 1000 - Case studies on how companies got their first 1000 customers

localize.description: 📈顶级创业公司如何找到他们的早期客户？在First 1000上找到答案。我们每周都会分享一个案例研究，介绍Zapier、Doordash和Tinder等公司如何获得他们的第一批客户。
localize.tagline: 企业如何获得第一个1000个客户的案例研究

localize.description: 📈頂級創業公司如何找到他們的早期客戶？在First 1000上找到答案。我們每週都會分享一個案例研究，介紹Zapier、Doordash和Tinder等公司如何獲得他們的第一批客戶。
localize.tagline: 企業如何獲得第一個1000個客戶的案例研究

next.excerpt: WeHatePasswords is a Google Chrome extension that replaces all password fields with easy to remember pixel art. Gone are the days of remembering complicated passwords. Simply draw to log in. Compatible with password managers.
next.title: WeHatePasswords 2.0 - You hate passwords. That's where we come in.

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌浏览器扩展，它可以用易于记忆的像素艺术取代所有密码字段。记住复杂密码的日子已经一去不复返了。只需画出密码即可登录。与密码管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你讨厌密码 这就是我们的优势所在。

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌瀏覽器擴展，它可以用易於記憶的像素藝術取代所有密碼字段。記住複雜密碼的日子已經一去不復返了。只需畫出密碼即可登錄。與密碼管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你討厭密碼 這就是我們的優勢所在。
